title: Cancer Diagnosis
description: This designates that a referenced Condition resource is a cancer diagnosis

id.description: The primary identifier of the resource

deletedAt.description: The time when the resource was deleted

coding.description: This defines the required attributed for a FHIR code

system.description: The coding system that defines what the code represents

code.description: The specific code determined by the system that specifies the value.

display.description: The human readable value for the code

version.description: The specific version of the system where the code is defined

codeableConcept.description: This is a CodeableConcept with an extracted emrText attribute that dictates the correct value to represent in an EMR context.

resource.description: When this exists, it represents a reference to an actual resource. This is derived from the data specified in `reference`.

type.description: This is the ronin resource type

id.description: This is the ronin ID for the resource

type.description: The FHIR type attribute of the resource

reference.description: This should refer to a `resource.type/resource.id` but could refer to an external resource

items.description: The Condition that this resources is decorating

diagnosisDate.description: A FHIR date representation for Ronin's unified date of diagnosis

isPrimary.description: Whether the referenced cancer is considered a Primary Cancer Type

isActive.description: Whether the referenced cancer is considered active. This is derived from clinicalStatus of the referenced condition.

cancerType.description: What is the cancer type as well as based on what definition

category.description: Identifies this as a Cancer Diagnosis type

code.description: The product displayable codes to show with this diagnosis. Currently this is limited to ICD10 codes.

subject.description: The patient that this diagnosis is related to.

updatedAt.description: When want the resource last updated
